name: aether-mono
description: Controls modules in the Aether Monorepo.

scripts.audit: cd common; npm audit; cd ..; cd server; npm audit; cd ..; cd client; npm audit
scripts.install: cd common; npm install; cd ..; cd server; npm install; cd ..; cd client; npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev-common & npm run dev-server & npm run dev-client
scripts.build: npm run build-common; npm run build-client; npm run build-server

author: Auri Collings <me@auri.xyz>
